1.0.name: wordpress/red-nylon
1.0.description: Red Nylon is a stylish theme aimed for your fashion blogs and design journals. It is search-engine-optimized, gravater-supported, widget-ready, multi-browser-compatible. (Firefox, IE, and Google Chrome.) Full-width page, post pagination, threaded/paginated comments, comments reply function, smooth scrolling, multi-level drop down menu, custom menu, are integrated.
